name: Async Preparation Loop
description: Prepares the system for autonomous Slack-based operation. Run this before going mobile.

phases.name: Initialize
phases.description: Load current state and check prerequisites for async operation

phases.name: Gather Context
phases.description: Collect all 7 layers: dream state, roadmap, scores, patterns, calibration, history, improvements

phases.name: Score Modules
phases.description: Score all available modules and identify blockers

phases.name: Plan Moves
phases.description: Build prioritized queue of next 5-10 moves using leverage protocol

gates.name: Plan Review
gates.description: Review the planned moves before proceeding

phases.name: Verify Channels
phases.description: Validate Slack connection and test notification delivery

phases.name: Handoff
phases.description: Final confirmation - system is ready for async operation
phases.completionMessage: Ready for async operation. Go mobile and use 'Start Next' on Slack.

prerequisites: At least one module ready for work
